component.name: InterfaceExpander
component.summary: GUI to control USB-to-I2C interface device

description.p: InterfaceExpander is a GUI designed to interface with the AlmDevices USB-to-I²C Converter. It allows users to control and monitor I²C communication through an intuitive GUI, enabling both master and slave operations. The application facilitates the testing and development of systems using custom I²C protocols, providing a seamless bridge between USB and I²C devices.
